product_name: The North Face Bernal Chukka Boots - Men's
long_description: The rugged, yet refined, waterproof Bernal Chukka boots from The North Face blend durable outdoor materials and construction with everyday street style. Waterproof full-grain leather uppers will keep your feet dry when you're strolling down wet sidewalks; gusseted tongues add weather resistance. Linings feature soft pigskin leather and recycled PET mesh. Supportive, compression-molded removable footbeds are made from partially recycled EVA. Lightweight, durable Vibram(R) Christy outsoles have a vintage look and rugged lugs for grip; they offer good stability and cushioning on a variety of surfaces.
short_description: The rugged, yet refined, waterproof Bernal Chukka boots from The North Face blend durable outdoor materials and construction with everyday street style.
